name: IMMZ.DT.04.Diptheria
description: If child or person has not been given DTP-containing vaccine (DTPCV) provide 12-23 months (DTPCV) , 4-7 years (Td/DT containing vaccine), and 1 booster 9-15 years (Td)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Diptheria - No Doses
action.description: Provide DTP immunization 1st dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme) if the patient is the older 6 weeks of age
